Macros | Functions
Novatek DC DBI Driver
devices

Detailed Description

Purpose: This module provides a hardware abstraction layer for Novatek display controllers with DBI (Display Bus Interface) support, specifically optimized for NT35510 driver IC. It enables high-resolution graphics rendering, display initialization, and region-based rendering for embedded applications requiring visual interfaces. The driver supports multiple color modes, hardware reset functionality, and features like pre-divider configuration for optimal display performance and system integration.

Key Features

  1. DBI Protocol: Parallel display bus interface.
  2. NT35510 Support: Optimized for Novatek NT35510 IC.
  3. High-resolution Rendering: Supports 480x800 pixel graphics.
  4. Color Modes: Multiple color coding options.
  5. Hardware Reset: Reliable panel initialization.

Functionality

  • Initialize and configure Novatek DBI display
  • Set display parameters and pixel format
  • Manage region updates and hardware reset
  • Support for pre-divider configuration

Usage

  1. Initialize display with am_devices_dc_dbi_novatek_init()
  2. Set region and color mode as needed
  3. Use hardware reset for display control

Configuration

  • Configure DBI timing and pixel format
  • Set up region parameters
  • Adjust color coding and pre-divider settings

◆ am_devices_dc_dbi_novatek_hardware_reset()

void am_devices_dc_dbi_novatek_hardware_reset ( void )

Global type definitions.

External function definitions.

Reset the display panel

This function resets the display panel by toggling reset pin.

◆ am_devices_dc_dbi_novatek_init()

uint32_t am_devices_dc_dbi_novatek_init ( am_devices_dc_config_t * psDisplayPanelConfig)

Initialize dbi_novatek's IC NT35510 with interface.

Parameters
psDisplayPanelConfig- Display panel configuration structure.
pDCConfig- Display controller configuration structure.
Note
This function configures display panel with the configurations in sDisplayPanelConfig. It should be called after NemaDC and DBI are initialized and configured.
Returns
status.

◆ am_devices_dc_dbi_novatek_set_region()

uint32_t am_devices_dc_dbi_novatek_set_region ( uint16_t ui16ResX,
uint16_t ui16ResY,
uint16_t ui16MinX,
uint16_t ui16MinY )

Set the region to be updated.

Parameters
ui16ResX- X resolution of display region
ui16ResY- Y resolution of display region
ui16MinX- X-axis starting point of display region
ui16MinY- Y-axis starting point of display region

This function can be used to set display region of display driver IC.

Returns
status.
